name: Harrison Dayhew Prototypes
description:
In this package are four experimental games created by Harrison Dayhew.

Changing Seasons is a small painting game created in Processing, this game allows you to paint in random shades of green and when you left mouse click the colours change to random shades of blue. With the combination of both this shows the changing seasons.

Space Dodge is a fun 2D dodge 'em game. Fly around to dodge asteroids and watch below you as the black hole looms beneath you. The longer you survive, the more points you score.

Retro Racer is a 3D car game. You need to dodge past all incoming traffic in this 80's retro environment. Drive the furthest for the highest score.

Balancing Sun is a marble balancing game, balance your way through tough puzzles and reach the golden goal to vcitory.
